mutants.code:
def absolute_difference(x, y):
    if x <= y:
        (x, y) = (y, x)
    difference = 0
    carry = 0
    while x > 0 or y > 0:
        digit_x = x % 10
        digit_y = y % 10
        diff = digit_x - digit_y + carry
        if diff < 0:
            diff += 10
            carry = -1
        else:
            carry = 0
        difference = difference * 10 + diff
        x //= 10
        y //= 10
    return difference
